headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
The Kosatka and all its Upgrades and Modifications are 35% off this week, to help prep for various skirmishes on Cayo Perico.

Get your hands on a tiny steering wheel: both the Dinka Veto Classic and Modern are 40% off. There is also a selection of other vehicles, both weaponized and not, to help make the most of your heisting activities.

Vapid Slamtruck – 40% off
Sparrow – 40% off
Kraken Avisa – 40% off
Weaponized Dinghy – 40% off

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
